item.description:
The Boston Poetry Collective has posted the full schedule for its 2012 Dog Day Poetry Marathoon. This series of readings and 15-minute talks on literary topics, spread over Friday, Saturday, and Sunday, August 17th-19th, will take place at Outpost 186 in Inman Square, Cambridge.

An unofficial flyer suitable for printing and distribution can be downloaded at http://files.meetup.com/122206/dog-days-poetry-marathoon-2012.pdf. For more information about the event, visit http://bostonpoetry.blogspot.com or email bostonpoetry@gmail.com.

SUNDAY
1:00 - 4:00pm

1:00 Anthony Cuellar
1:08 Suzanne Mercury
1:16 Joel Sloman
1:24 James Cook
1:32 Farrah Field
1:40 Kimberly Lyons
1:48 Anna Moschovakis
break
2:06 Rachel Levitsky: Talk on the Office of Recuperative Strategies
2:21 Jim Dunn: Talk on Harry Crosby
2:36 Carol Weston: Talk on Stephen Jonas
break
3:01 Aaron Kiely
3:09 Ryan Gallagher
3:17 David Rich
3:25 Amanda Cook
3:33 Sean Cole
3:41 Michael Franco
3:49 Gerrit Lansing
item.name: Day 3 of 3: 2012 Dog Days Poetry Marathoon
